title: Ginevra de' Benci
provenance: Commissioned by the Benci family, Florence. Acquired from the Princely House of Liechtenstein in 1967.
exhibitions: Leonardo da Vinci: Master Draftsman, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, 2003.

title: The Railway
credit: Gift of Horace Havemeyer in memory of his mother, Louisine W. Havemeyer
provenance: Victor Chocquet collection, Paris; Havemeyer collection, New York.
exhibitions: Paris Salon of 1874; Impressionism, Fashion, and Modernity, 2012.

title: Little Dancer Aged Fourteen
credit: Collection of Mr. and Mrs. Paul Mellon
provenance: Degas estate, Paris; Paul Mellon Collection, Virginia.
exhibitions: Degas and the Little Dancer, Joslyn Art Museum, 1998.

title: Self-Portrait
credit: Collection of Mr. and Mrs. John Hay Whitney
provenance: Theo van Gogh, Paris; Whitney Family, New York.
exhibitions: Van Gogh's Van Goghs, National Gallery of Art, 1998.

title: The Shaw Memorial
provenance: Artist's studio; Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site.
